food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me!

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys eat me.
💛 My color is yellow.
➡️ You peel me before eating me.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cookies.

hints.text: 🥛 I'm often in your cereal.
🐄 Cows give me.
🍪 I taste great with cookies.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on trees. Doctors say I keep them away!

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on a tree.
🩺 They say I keep doctors away.
🔴 I am usually red.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me!

hints.text: 🥕 A bunny might eat me.
🧡 My color is orange.
💪 I'm good for your eyesight.

food.question: I am long and brown and covered in chocolate. Sometimes I have nuts!

hints.text: 🍫 I have chocolate in me.
🌰 Sometimes I have nuts.
📏 I'm often shaped like a bar.

food.question: I am made of bread, cheese, and sauce, and cooked in the oven!

hints.text: 🍕 You can order me for delivery.
🧀 I always have cheese.
🔥 I'm baked in an oven.

food.question: I am a fruit with fuzzy skin. I am green inside and sweet.

hints.text: 🥝 I have lots of little black seeds.
🟤 I have fuzzy skin.
🟢 My inside is green.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. I'm green and good for you.

hints.text: 🥦 I look like a small tree.
💪 I'm good for you.
🟢 My colour is green.

food.question: I am a cold treat that comes in many flavors. I'm often served in a cone.

hints.text: 🍦 I can be chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry.
🥶 I am very cold.
🧇 I'm often served in a cone.

food.question: I am made from grapes, but I'm not something you chew. I'm often served at dinner in a fancy glass.

hints.text: 🍇 I start as a grape.
🍷 Adults sometimes drink me with dinner.
🍾 I'm often in a fancy bottle.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, and I make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌧️ I make puddles.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow, and I shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give you light.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I can make you feel warm.

weather.question: I am white and cold, and I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen water.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves to play with me.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees. Sometimes I am gentle, sometimes I am strong. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I can blow your hat off your head.
🍃 I make the leaves dance.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy, and I float in the sky. Sometimes I block the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can be different shapes.
🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
🌧️ Rain often comes from me.

weather.question: I am a storm with very strong winds that spin around. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can cause a lot of damage.
🏠 People sometimes have to leave their houses when I come.
🌊 I often start over warm ocean water.

weather.question: I am small balls of ice that fall from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am like frozen rain, but harder.
🤕 Sometimes I can hurt if I hit you.
⛈️ I usually fall during a thunderstorm.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm, followed by a loud boom. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am very bright.
💥 I happen at the same time as thunder.
🌩️ I am dangerous, so stay inside!

weather.question: I am a colourful arc in the sky that appears after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colours.
🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
✨ Some people say there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a thick cloud near the ground that makes it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I am like a cloud on the ground.
🚗 You have to drive slowly when I'm around.
👻 I can make things look spooky.
